column1: Biomedical Science - Medical Microbiology with Management Studies (MSc)
column3: Faculty of Health, Science, Social Care and Education
column5: Why choose this course?This course links academic knowledge to the practical applications of biomedical science and management in a business context. It offers a broad understanding of disease processes and their diagnosis, in-depth knowledge of immunology and either haematology or medical microbiology, and expertise in management practice.You will carry out your project in your specialist subject which can be an excellent selling point when looking for a job or promotion. You will develop skills in finance, accounting, marketing, organisational management, entrepreneurship and leadership, to enhance your employability and career.
